topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bc86ba636872288cb80500#post_54bc86ba636872288cb80500
Ok, heres my new idea.

Humanity has expanded so much that they need to start colonising new worlds, unfortunately, they aren't able to find any habitable ones that are close to their existing ones, so instead they decide to build new planets instead. Your characters job is to scout out a bunch of asteroids meteors and comets to use in building your new planet. You can also build moons to orbit your planet with smaller asteroids. Also, there are space ships as big as the moon.
